    "file_path": "h2q_project/quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import torch

def quaternion_conjugate(q: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Computes the conjugate of a quaternion.

    Args:
        q: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing quaternions.

    Returns:
        A tensor of the same shape as q representing the quaternion conjugates.
    """
    q_conj = q.clone()
    q_conj[..., 1:] *= -1
    return q_conj

def quaternion_multiply(q1: torch.Tensor, q2: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Multiplies two quaternions.

    Args:
        q1: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing the first quaternion.
        q2: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing the second quaternion.

    Returns:
        A tensor of the same shape as q1 and q2 representing the product of the quaternions.
    """
    w1, x1, y1, z1 = q1[..., 0], q1[..., 1], q1[..., 2], q1[..., 3]
    w2, x2, y2, z2 = q2[..., 0], q2[..., 1], q2[..., 2], q2[..., 3]

    w = w1 * w2 - x1 * x2 - y1 * y2 - z1 * z2
    x = w1 * x2 + x1 * w2 + y1 * z2 - z1 * y2
    y = w1 * y2 - x1 * z2 + y1 * w2 + z1 * x2
    z = w1 * z2 + x1 * y2 - y1 * x2 + z1 * w2

    return torch.stack((w, x, y, z), dim=-1)

def quaternion_to_matrix(q: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Converts a quaternion to a rotation matrix.

    Args:
        q: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing a quaternion.

    Returns:
        A tensor of shape (..., 3, 3) representing the rotation matrix.
    """
    w, x, y, z = q[..., 0], q[..., 1], q[..., 2], q[..., 3]
    Nq = torch.sum(q * q, dim=-1)
    if not torch.is_nonzero(Nq).any():
        return torch.eye(3, device=q.device, dtype=q.dtype).expand(*q.shape[:-1], 3, 3)
    s = 2.0 / Nq
    X = x * s
    Y = y * s
    Z = z * s
    wX = w * X
    wY = w * Y
    wZ = w * Z
    xX = x * X
    xY = x * Y
    xZ = x * Z
    yY = y * Y
    yZ = y * Z
    zZ = z * Z

    matrix = torch.empty((*q.shape[:-1], 3, 3), device=q.device, dtype=q.dtype)
    matrix[..., 0, 0] = 1.0 - (yY + zZ)
    matrix[..., 0, 1] = xY - wZ
    matrix[..., 0, 2] = xZ + wY
    matrix[..., 1, 0] = xY + wZ
    matrix[..., 1, 1] = 1.0 - (xX + zZ)
    matrix[..., 1, 2] = yZ - wX
    matrix[..., 2, 0] = xZ - wY
    matrix[..., 2, 1] = yZ + wX
    matrix[..., 2, 2] = 1.0 - (xX + yY)
    return matrix


def matrix_to_quaternion(matrix: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Converts a rotation matrix to a quaternion.

    Args:
        matrix: A tensor of shape (..., 3, 3) representing the rotation matrix.

    Returns:
        A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing the quaternion.
    """
    batch_dim = matrix.shape[:-2]
    m00 = matrix[..., 0, 0]
    m01 = matrix[..., 0, 1]
    m02 = matrix[..., 0, 2]
    m10 = matrix[..., 1, 0]
    m11 = matrix[..., 1, 1]
    m12 = matrix[..., 1, 2]
    m20 = matrix[..., 2, 0]
    m21 = matrix[..., 2, 1]
    m22 = matrix[..., 2, 2]

    trace = m00 + m11 + m22
    quaternion = torch.empty((*batch_dim, 4), device=matrix.device, dtype=matrix.dtype)

    mask_trace = trace > 0
    mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2 = (m11 > m00) & (m11 > m22)
    mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1 = (m22 > m00) & (m22 > m11)

    if mask_trace.any():
        t = torch.sqrt(trace[mask_trace] + 1.0)
        quaternion[mask_trace, 0] = 0.5 * t
        quaternion[mask_trace, 1] = (m21[mask_trace] - m12[mask_trace]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_trace, 2] = (m02[mask_trace] - m20[mask_trace]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_trace, 3] = (m10[mask_trace] - m01[mask_trace]) / (2.0 * t)

    if mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2.any():
        t = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m11[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2] - m00[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2] - m22[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2])
        quaternion[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2, 1] = 0.5 * t
        quaternion[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2, 0] = (m21[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2] - m12[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2, 2] = (m01[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2] + m10[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2, 3] = (m02[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2] + m20[mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2]) / (2.0 * t)

    if mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1.any():
        t = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m22[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1] - m00[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1] - m11[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1])
        quaternion[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1, 2] = 0.5 * t
        quaternion[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1, 0] = (m02[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1] - m20[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1, 1] = (m01[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1] + m10[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1, 3] = (m12[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1] + m21[mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1]) / (2.0 * t)

    mask_else = ~(mask_trace | mask_col1_gt_col0_and_gt_col2 | mask_col2_gt_col0_and_gt_col1)
    if mask_else.any():
        t = torch.sqrt(1.0 + m00[mask_else] - m11[mask_else] - m22[mask_else])
        quaternion[mask_else, 3] = 0.5 * t
        quaternion[mask_else, 0] = (m10[mask_else] - m01[mask_else]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_else, 1] = (m02[mask_else] + m20[mask_else]) / (2.0 * t)
        quaternion[mask_else, 2] = (m12[mask_else] + m21[mask_else]) / (2.0 * t)


    return quaternion

def quaternion_norm(q: torch.Tensor) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Computes the norm (magnitude) of a quaternion.

    Args:
        q: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing quaternions.

    Returns:
        A tensor of shape (...) representing the norm of the quaternions.
    """
    return torch.linalg.norm(q, dim=-1)


def quaternion_normalize(q: torch.Tensor, epsilon: float = 1e-8) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Normalizes a quaternion to unit length.

    Args:
        q: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing quaternions.
        epsilon: A small value to prevent division by zero.

    Returns:
        A tensor of the same shape as q representing the normalized quaternions.
    """
    norm = quaternion_norm(q)
    return q / (norm[..., None] + epsilon)


def quaternion_inverse(q: torch.Tensor, epsilon: float = 1e-8) -> torch.Tensor:
    """Computes the inverse of a quaternion.

    Args:
        q: A tensor of shape (..., 4) representing quaternions.
        epsilon: A small value to prevent division by zero.

    Returns:
        A tensor of the same shape as q representing the inverse quaternion.
    """
    q_conj = quaternion_conjugate(q)
    norm_squared = torch.sum(q * q, dim=-1, keepdim=True)
    return q_conj / (norm_squared + epsilon)
"
  }
